Content: In conformity with military traditions, Major General R.L.C Fernando Commander, Forward Maintenance Area (FMA)-North received a fitting welcome when he returned to the FMA HQ upon receipt of his promotion as Major General. On his arrival at the headquarters, he was welcomed in a formal Guard Turn out, presented by FMA troops on Wednesday (05), To mark this event, he planted a sapling and joined for refreshments. Major General R.L.C Fernando also addressed the troops at the HQ and reminded them of their duties.
